contentTitle: Welcome to Hydrafacial Privacy Request Form!
contentDescriptionOne: You can use this form to submit a request regarding your personal information that is processed by Hydrafacial and its subsidiaries and affiliates. Please complete this form and we will respond as soon as possible.
contentDescriptionTwo: Be aware that these rights do not apply in all circumstances, but where we can weâ€™ll give you what you want.
jobtitle: Your Job Title or Position Applied For
noteDetailsOne: Hydrafacial and its subsidiaries and affiliates can only action requests from individuals with a direct relationship to Hydrafacial or its subsidiaries and affiliates. This includes requests from our clients/consumers, estis, providers, job applicants, employees or marketing recipients.
noteDetailsTwo: The data collected in this form will be processed for the sole purpose of managing your request.
noteDetailsThree: For more details and information about how we use and protect your personal information, please visit our

fileSupport: Supported file types: JPG, JPEG, PNG, SVG, GIF, PDF
footerTitle: If you are looking to make a request to a company that uses Hydrafacial, please directly do so on their website
